entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:28 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 01:24 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: W 18 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Windy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
